title: Wan2.2 I2V Remix
description: Generate AI-guided video interpolation between two images using Wan2.2 I2V Remix with text prompts

input.name: Refresh Worker
input.description: When enabled, the worker will stop after each finished job to have a clean state

input.name: Polling Max Retries
input.description: Maximum retries for ComfyUI server availability

input.name: Polling Interval (ms)
input.description: Interval between polling attempts in milliseconds
